title: Login Screen Won't Launch
body: Whenever I load the launcher and click launch, the login screen doesn't come up. I've tried what I can find but nothing works.

replies.body:
If you're clicking on launch and then just....nothing happens at all, it might be due to a lack of certain permissions. Your OS needs to have certain permissions set up in order to allow some programs to launch, otherwise it can block the program entirely. 

Check out our [**Permission Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for how you can get those settings in place. Let me know if you have any questions!
